attributes.action: The Media please stop making up stories that cause hate crime
attributes.additional_details: Press and media eg daily mail and express star and sun stop them from publishing fear ansd hate stories towards innocent folk
attributes.background: Stop biased press spreading fear and hatred stories towards muslims,disabled and vulnerable people

rejection.details: Your petition seems to be asking the media to take this action. That's not something that the UK Government and Parliament can make happen.
